mutants.code:
def find_minimum_time_chocolate(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, M, P, T_ij) = case
        min_time = float('inf')
        min_index = 1
        for i in range(N):
            temp1 = sum(T_ij[i])
            temp2 = temp1 + K * P[i] + M * (P[i] - 1)
            if temp2 < min_time:
                min_time = temp2
                min_index = i + 1
        results.append((min_index, min_time))
    return results
